## Checklist

- [ ] I have formatted this PR's Title as follows: `[Jira ID] - [Jira item's Title]`.
- [ ] I have included a link to Jira work item at the start of this PR's description.
- [ ] The branch name starts with the Jira ID, e.g.: `ABC-123-add-user-endpoint`.
- [ ] PR description contains no information that should instead live in Jira (exception: reviewer/tester-specific notes (if any)).
